pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. -*-restructuredtext-*-.. image:: https://github.com/ubernostrum/django-contact-form/workflows/CI/badge.svg :alt: CI status image :target: https://github.com/ubernostrum/django-contact-form/actions?query=workflow%3ACIThis application provides extensible contact-form functionality for`Django <https://www.djangoproject.com/>`_ sites.Full documentation for all functionality is included and is also`available online <http://django-contact-form.readthedocs.io/>`_.
